data.title: Webinar Events on Cloud Computing
data.meta_description: Watch on-demand webinars by NetApp to learn about AWS and Azure storage costs, deployments, cloud workloads, databases in the coud and more.
data.text:
Watch the on-demand webinar to hear all about how to declutter your company data in time for the new year.

Cloud Data Sense

Watch Now

Watch our on-demand webinar to see how you could map ALL your data without moving anything around and learn how you can empower your IT teams with worry-free discovery and classification of organizational data.

Cloud Data Sense

Watch Now

Watch now to learn: How to run in the cloud and experience the same performance – or better – as on-premises and more...

Azure

Azure NetApp Files

Watch Now

The question becomes, how is the market addressing the transition to S4/HANA in the cloud? Join us as experts from IDC and NetApp explore these issues – and potential solutions.

Azure

Azure NetApp Files

Watch Now

We will talk about how Azure NetApp Files removes the storage bottleneck giving you the agility, performance and availability critical to your HPC workloads.

December 3rd, 2020 - 9:00 AM PST

With over 20 years’ experience in databases, Jeff takes you through three NetApp-based approaches to moving and running databases to the cloud, including technical and budget considerations.
